parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The complete URL of a specific news item, URL-encoded or backslash-escaped

parameters.name: source
parameters.description:
Limits the set of items by originating source

all = items from both The New York Times and The International New York Times
nyt = New York Times items only
iht = International New York Times items only

parameters.name: section
parameters.description:
Limits the set of items by one or more sections
all | One or more section names, separated by semicolons

 To get all sections, specify all. To get a particular section or sections, use the section names returned by this request:
 http://api.nytimes.com/svc/news/v3/content/section-list.json

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of results, between 1 and 20

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Sets the starting point of the result set

parameters.name: source
parameters.description:
Limits the set of items by originating source

all = items from both The New York Times and The International New York Times
nyt = New York Times items only
iht = International New York Times items only

parameters.name: section
parameters.description:
Limits the set of items by one or more sections
all | One or more section names, separated by semicolons

 To get all sections, specify all. To get a particular section or sections, use the section names returned by this request:
 http://api.nytimes.com/svc/news/v3/content/section-list.json

parameters.name: time-period
parameters.description: Limits the set of items by time published, integer in number of hours

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of results, between 1 and 20

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Sets the starting point of the result set

apiDescription: With the Times Newswire API, you can get links and metadata for Times articles and blog posts as soon as they are published on NYTimes.com. The Times Newswire API provides an up-to-the-minute stream of published items.
